title: Baned because Lol is having some truble????????????
body: So because if you get an error in quer and client trows you out of the client, you get a ban??? Why do I get a ban?? Can someone explain pls?

replies.body: It doesn't look like this account is banned, or has ever been banned before. Let me know if you were talking about a different account and I can take a look for ya.
